attributes.action: Stop Brexit! We, Britain's youth, deserve to have a say in our own futures
attributes.additional_details: 75% of 18-24 year olds voted to remain in the EU. Under 18s deserve to have a say as many of the people voting out have already completed their free education, bought their houses, and got their jobs. What about us?
attributes.background: Brexit should not happen because we, young people who did not get a chance to vote but will be most affected, should have a say in our future. (Sign only if you are under 18).

rejection.details: It's not clear how you would like people under 18 to be able to have their say. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to happen.
